Background:

I'm a Tufts University graduate with a BA in Psychology and a minor in English. Understanding how people think and why they act drives me, and I've channeled this interest into the world of marketing. My own passion centers around green cars (huge Tesla fanboy here) and alternative energy, and I hope to focus my marketing efforts in this industry.

On an equally important note, I'm laid back, love hanging out with people and having fun, and make sure to fit in both time outdoors and time going out with friends every week. Work hard play hard seems to be the startup mentality, and with the right company, i'm ready to jump in!
